explains: n. 前进；进步；航行速度；间隔时间
wordGroup: make headway 取得进展；有进展

sentences.en: We are making little headway with the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 我们的谈判没有取得什么进展。

sentences.en: There was concern in the city that police were making little headway in the investigation.
sentences.cn: 这个城市里的人们担心警方没有在调查中取得一丁点进展。

sentences.en: The headway ran almost out, and he drew up slowly toward the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 船几乎停稳了，他慢慢地向人行道靠去。
